description.en:
Mikio Igarashi's house used to be a doll's house !! Comic artist Mikio Igarashi. The latest work is a doll!

The dolls are based on real objects collected by his longtime companion, his wife.

Selected children appear from 50 dolls (according to my wife) who read mackerel.

Set in the Igarashi family, the dolls run around with stories about the family's recent situation.

40 years of painting, Mikio Igarashi's achievement.

Please enjoy the world of "doll x non-fiction x talking".

■ Contents

"Doll House Kotobuki" (26 episodes in total)

Ambitious work depicting the ego of a penguin

"Bob at the Zoo" (7 episodes in total)

<Special recording>

First ever!

Interview with Mr. and Mrs. Igarashi
First public exhibition in Japan Drawing the floor plan of Igarashi House "Doll House Kotobuki" " Bob at the Zoo" Sequel "Doll House Kotobuki" started with the idea of ​​creating a manga with This work includes a conversation with his wife for the first time in history. In addition, the floor plan of the Igarashi house, which will be unveiled for the first time in Japan, is also posted. It is a content that allows you to enter the world of dolls. [Highlight] This work is the last! ? The word "this may be the last" leaked in the afterword of this work. As Mikio Igarashi's achievement, this is a must-read work for all Mikio Igarashi fans.

[Highlight] "Doll House Kotobuki", where you can see the changes in Mikio Igarashi's heart, conveys the events of the Igarashi family from April 2017 to June 2021 through dolls. Through the M-1, the World Cup, the corona disaster, etc., the story is wide-ranging, such as rebuilding the house, joining the cat family, and leaving the office.
